data.title: Summer Olympics 2000 Results
data.text:
Basketball Track & Field Gymnastics Swimming Soccer Volleyball Boxing Baseball Softball More Sports Results Schedule Venues Photos Message Board

Results -- Thursday, Sept. 21

Note: Results are listed on the date they were contested in Sydney. Schedules and MedalTracker results are listed in EDT, which is 15 hours behind Sydney time. Archery

Women's team final:

South Korea def. Ukraine 251-239

Women's team third place:

Germany def. Turkey 240-234

South Korea def. Germany 251-238

Ukraine def. Turkey 240-233

Turkey def. Taiwan 234-227

Judo

Key to Japanese scoring terms:

ippon (full point)

waza-ari (half-point)

waza-ari-awasete ippon (two half-points)

yuko (almost waza-ari)

koka (almost yuko)

yusei-gachi (decision)

sogo-gachi (compound win)

fusen-gachi (default)

kiken-gachi (withdrawn)

chui (caution)

keikoku (warning)

hansoku-make (disqualified)
